sources.title: Iron Mask
sources.description: 1952 re-release of the 1929 film, narrated by Douglas Fairbanks Jr. Based on the Futher Adventures of the Three Musketeers

metadata.Plot: A female version of 'The Man in the Iron Mask'. In this version, the mask is put on a princess (Patricia Medina) rather than a prince as in the original book by Alexandre Dumas.
metadata.Writer: Alexandre Dumas, Jack Pollexfen, Aubrey Wisberg
metadata.Actors: Louis Hayward, Patricia Medina, John Sutton
